title: DeRozan's Respect Level, Updated COVID Protocols
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Marc J. Spears and Jorge Sedano to talk how DeMar DeRozan is viewed around the league, updates to the NBA G League Ignite, the latest COVID protocols around the NBA including who is required to wear masks.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
